name: cmcm2ii

stmt.origin: mpbi(wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1)), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1))
-| wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1))
-| wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, c1))
-| wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: Commutation with orthocomplement. Theorem 2.3(i) of [Beran] p. 39. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
